715824f-a.title: Manhattan: 218th Street (West) - Park Terrace East
715824f-a.text:
West 218th Street (center of view, running from left to right and partially obscured by trees), west from Park Terrace East (extreme left), to Indian Road (right, not seen), showing Baker Field-Columbia University as viewed southward across it from its northern boundary; the Harlem River. On the left is shown the practice gridiron, to its right (foreground); the varsity baseball field and across it, the intercollegiate football field.
1936.

W.P.A. Photo.
Federal Writers Project.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
